properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
TURKEY.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 31 MAR
   BY M/V OGS EXPLORA IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 36-29.2N 035-41.6E, 36-28.7N 035-43.6E,
      36-26.6N 035-42.6E, 36-27.2N 035-40.6E.
   B. 36-27.0N 035-31.2E, 36-26.6N 035-33.1E,
      36-24.5N 035-32.3E, 36-25.0N 035-30.3E.
   2000 METER BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 APR.
